Reason: The _snapshotSerializers configuration option is not performance-sensitive. The configuration is only used during the initialization of the Prevayler instance in the create() method. It does not involve any time-expensive or memory-expensive operations that would lead to notable performance variations at the system level. The impact of this configuration is limited to setting the journalSerializer for the PrevaylerImpl instance and does not have a significant impact on overall system performance.
